vsParam:
Hey!
It's not working, one more time! Take that!
Ah, Wilbell! Are you practicing wizardry?

More or less. I don't want to cause another
forest fire like I did last time.

I could finally use wizardry at will,
I must work harder to train and cultivate myself!

Ha ha! You are very motivated!
... Hmm?

May I ask what's the stone
you are holding in your hand?

Ah, this? It's a wizardry accelerant.
You don't know about this thing?

Er... We use it in complicated wizardry occasionally.
Is this thing common in your world, Wilbell?

Yes, we use it to improve our magic power. The wizardry
effects are very different when you use accelerants.
Oh. We have a lot differences though we are all witches.

Actually, I am almost running out of
accelerants.

Hey, [px], you are an alchemist, right?
Can you make some for me?

No problem! Making items for another world sounds
quite interesting huh? [px]!

Hee hee, thanks!
I appreciate that!

Hey, Wilbell!
What do you think?

Oh oh. Have you finished!
Thank you!

Uh huh, you are a real alchemist!
Accelerants made with alchemy are of very good quality!
Does the accelerants' quality related to wizardry?

Of course! Alchemy can make very pure accelerants,
more powerful magic power can be extracted from them.

Hmm. Let's do this,
Wilbell, why don't you come and try alchemy yourself?
That's great! Come synthesize with us!

Wow! It sounds suspicious!
Are you sure you are not discouraging me!?
Alchemy is too complicated for me... Nope!

You, you think about it! For a great witch like myself,
how could I do such a menial job, huh!
Hehe. I heard you say "complicated", didn't I?
You... heard me wrong! I, I didn't say that!

Great witches like me are very busy,
I better leave this thing to an expert!

[px], I'll come look for your help when I use all accelerants
again, thank you very much!

That's alright... I've got my accelerants,
I am going to cultivate. See you!

She was...
She was definitely trying to save her face, right?

Ah ha-ha. After all, Wilbell
is still a child!
